directions: Stir water, kimchi, pork shoulder, hot pepper paste, sugar, and salt together in a pot; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and simmer until meat is tender, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in green onions.
ingredients: 2 cups kimchi, cut into bite-size pieces
1/2 pound boneless pork shoulder, cut into bite-size pieces
title: Kimchi Soup
